Plot: When Cartman and his friends go see an R rated movie, they start cursing and their parents think that Canada is to blame.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 7 wins & 10 nominations.
Writer: Trey Parker (television series South Park), Matt Stone (television series South Park), Trey Parker, Matt Stone, Pam Brady
Title: South Park: Bigger, Longer & Uncut
Actors: Trey Parker, Matt Stone, Mary Kay Bergman, Isaac Hayes
